reviews.comments: Todo tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Un lugar super calido y Fernando muy atento!
Todo
Pasamos una excelente estadía en Maison Verte. La casa es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Es cómoda, está muy bien equipada y la zona es muy tranquila. Fernando siempre muy atento en todo.
La casa es sumamente confortable, realmente la recomendamos
Excelente la comunicación con Fernando, la acogida, atención, información turística y local. Bella la cabaña, cálida y super cómoda. Cerca del centro de la ciudad. Excelente estadía!!!!

Todo exelente. La amabilidad, la predisposición a resolver inconvenienetes (corte de luz por problemas ajenos a la vivienda), información sobre el lugar, utensillos extras como termo para poder tomar mate. El lugar muy tranquilo y cerca del centro. La casa muy linda y exelente distribución. Con lavarropa que nos ayudo mucho ya que veniamos de estadia en Ushuaia de varios dias. En comunicación permanente por watsapp. Todo bien. Muy recomendable!!!
Excelente Departamenteo, completo, limpió, espacioso. Cuenta con lavarropas, losa radiante, Netflix etc. Totalmente recomendable
reviews.response:
Gracias Oskar! Estamos agradecidos de haberlos hospedado, han sido muy buenos huéspedes.
Esperamos verlos pronto de regreso por aquí!

Maison Verte

reviews.comments: Excelente estadía, lugar muy completo limpió y cómodo. Totalmente recomendable.

La casa de Fernando es hermosa. Amplia, cómoda, bien equipada, muy cómoda. Las camas son cómodas y es muy cálida, la losa radiante funciona espectacular. Solo hay que organizarse si son muchos a la hora de bañarse para que recupere el termotanque. Muy recomendable!

Hermosa la (URL HIDDEN) tal cual se ve en las fotos. Volveria otra vez . 
Lo mejor de lo mejor fue la Loza Radiante ..muy comodos estuvimos ¡¡¡
Excelente la casa, muy recomendable,  la pasamos muy bien, gracias
Recomendable

Lo mejor es la loza radiante. La casa es muy calentita. Ideal para ir en invierno. Esta a unas pocas cuadras del centro al que se puede acceder caminando sin problema. Vajilla completa como para cocinas y comer varias personas solo agregaria copas de vino ;) gracias x todo
Excelente lugar y atencion del anfitrion!! Muy recomendable para quien quiera pasar unos dias en El Calafate
Muy agradable y cómoda la cabaña. también tuvimos una excelente atencion.
Todo muy bien, gracias!
Muy buena opción para familias numerosas, somos seis personas y estuvimos muy cómodos, excelente calefacción...muy lindo lugar, tranquilo y cerca de todo. Volveríamos...

Mi primera estadía en El Calafate y elegimos un excelente lugar. Super cómodo y muy espacioso, lo mejor para descansar estando cerca del centro pero sin tanto ruido ni movimiento molesto. Lo mejor: la losa radiante!
Excelente hospedaje para quedarse en familia, cómodo y con todo lo necesario! Pasamos hermosos días, recomendable 100%!
La casa es muy linda, cómoda, limpia y muy equipada. Muy recomendable para pasar unos días tranquilos y conocer el calafate!!!
Lugar super limpio y ordenado, estilo patagonico.

La cabaña se corresponde exactamente con las fotos que muestra el sitio. Es apta para 7 personas. con una cocina y baño amplios y 3 dormitorios cómodos. La cocina esta equipada con todo lo necesario y los electrodomesticos funcionaban correctamente. Toda la cabaña estaba en excelente condiciones de limpieza. El agua caliente y la calefacción también funcionaban   correctamente. Tiene muy buena ubicación dado que se encuentra sobre una calle tranquila pero a pocas cuadras del centro del Calafate. Fernando nos brindò toda la información necesaria para llegar y nos esperò en la cabaña a la hora acordada. Estuvo atento a nuestras necesidades y nos  ayudò para recibir una valija que había llegado mas tarde. Por todo ello recomendamos esta cabaña para los que quieran visitar El Calafate, un lugar clave para visitar lugares fascinantes. Muchas gracias Fernando por tu hospitalidad y esperamos volver en otra oportunidad y alojarnos nuevamente en la cabaña.

Solo tengo palabras de agradecimiento para Fernando por la atención y felicitaciones por tan lindo lugar. Es altamente recomendable somos una familia de 6 personas, y la casa nos resulto  muy confortable, cómoda y amena.
Esta muy bien equipada y con una limpieza excelente. Espero volver a ir !!!
Una casa muy confortable para alojarse en familia o en grupo, el lugar fiel a las fotos, la casa muy bien equipada, pasamos una estadia muy agradable

Fernando un excelente anfitrion. Muy atento a que estuvieramos comodos y pudiesemos aprovechar al maximo nuestra corta estadia . y como no estar comodos en esa casa. es hermosisima. muy bien equipada. facil acceso y en un hermoso barrio. de lo mejor. muchas gracias Fernando. la pasamos excelente
La casa es muy bonita y está muy bien ubicada, cerca a la calle principal. La casa es cómoda y cuenta con muy bien espacio para acomodar un grupo de siete personas. ¡Divino el lugar!

Nuestra estadía fue genial. Fernando desde el inicio fue un excelente anfitrión, pues nos ayudó en orientarnos y así como a solucionarnos desde transfer hasta el cambio de moneda, para uno como turista en un nuevo país, esto es de Enorme ayuda! Adicional, la cabaña es super linda, esta bien cuidada y encuentras dentro de ella mas que lo necesario, mi familia y yo estuvimos muy tranquilos, cómodos y satisfechos con nuestra estadía. Esta a pocas cuadras del centro y puedes caminar sin problema. Mi recomendación es mas de 100 puntos, es un precio cómodo para todas las ventajas que adquieres a quedarte en Maison Verte! Super recomendado!

La casa muy confortable. El trato del anfitrion muy cordial y siempre dispuesto a ayudar. La calle muy tranquila y cerca del (URL HIDDEN) calefaccion muy confortable, a destacar!. En fin, muy aconsejable para cualquier viajero!!

La casa es muy bonita y se corresponde con las fotos. Es incluso más bonita en vivo.
Tiene una calefacción fabulosa de suelo radiante que se agradece en invierno y hace muy acogedora la estancia.
Muy buena situación a tan solo un paseo del centro.
La vivienda está muy limpia. 
Fernando fue un excelente anfitrión.

Excelente lugar!! Esta increíble el lugar!! Muy lindo y acogedor! Estoy seguro que no podrás encontrar un lugar así; en el Calafate , por la relación precio-servicio/producto.

Por otra parte , Fernando es muy amable y servicial!!! Recomendado!!

La casa es como se muestra en las fotos, tiene mucho encantado, todo muy limpio y nuevo. Éramos 6 personas y estuvimos muy cómodos todas las estancias eran muy amplias. Simplemente tuvimos un pequeño problemita con la calefacción pero Fernando se mostró muy dispuesto a ayudar en todo.

Calafate es pequeñito así que está cerca de la zona de tiendas.

Fernando como anfitrión se porto muy bien tanto dándonos consejos de la zona como facilitándonos entrar antes a la casa.

Estamos a 11 dias manejando por la Patagonia y la cabaña de Fernando es una de las mejores que nos quedamos. Hay todo que necessita, cocina completa, cocheras, camas muy buenas, ducha caliente y lo mejor hay piso caliente(perfecto). Recomendo a todos esta cabaña, e sinal de wifi es bueno. Fernando es una otima persona, no ayudó com informaciones turisticas e todo más. Nuevamente muchissimas gracias Fernando y a todos que vam a esta cabaña que desfruten.
Saludos
Will

La casa de Fernando es tal como muestran las fotos, amplia, cómoda, con muchos detalles que facilitan la estadía . Las habitaciones son amplias y cómodas y tiene mucho espacio para ordenar las cosas. La cocina impecable con todo muy limpio y organizado. Tiene lavadora que nos fue muy útil cuando viajas con niños y un lugar muy cómodo para (URL HIDDEN) ubicación es excelente, el barrio es muy tranquilo. Puedes moverte a pie al centro para encontrar tiendas y lugares para comer. El nos ofreció ayuda para ubicarnos y dispone de una mesita con muchos folletos de lugares que visitar. Nos otorgó privacidad y tranquilidad.
Excelente! Todo muy bien!!
Casa espaciosa equipada con todo lo necesario en cocina y cuartos, perfecta para unas vacaciones en familia o en grupos grandes de personas. Cómoda y anfitrión super amable. Recomendada!!

Fernando esta muy preocupado por el bienestar de sus visitantes. Estabamos muy bien en su casa y vamos a volver cada vez cuando nosotros vamos a visitar El Calafate. Gracias a vos Fernando. Estas un amor de dueno! Saludos cordiales Karin y su grupo

La casa es acogedora, cerca a restaurantes y lugar de compras , excelente limpieza calidad comodidad para visitar en familia, excelente atención del anfitrión, dotada de todo lo necesario para cocinar , supermercado cerca, camas sábanas y almohadas limpias y cómodas . Mi familia y yo la recomendamos como muy buena escisión de lugar cómodo acogedor y familiar limpio y excelente calidad. Felicitaciones fernando tienes una cabaña muy linda

Genial!! La casa es súper cómoda y linda, tienen todos los detalles cuidados y estaba muy limpia. Aún mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos. Fernando fue muy atento y amable con nosotros. Todo salió estupendo. Súper recomendable!

Excellent and comfortable stay. Fernando was super helpful with all of his tips and knowledge about El Calafate and what to do there. The house is comfortable with great beds and furniture. Shower is good and the kitchen is equipped with everything you need. We'll definitely stay there again in the future!

Amazing experience at Maison Verte! Easy to find, and only a short walk to the town center. Fernando was accommodating to our travel times, as well as helpful with any and all questions we had. The house was stocked with everything we could need, and was extremely comfortable and endearing. All in all a wonderful stay!
A quaint cottage which is a short walk from downtown. Fernando is a very courteous and knowledgeable host.

O Fernando é um anfitrião eficiente e tenta adaptar a casa para que todos tenham a melhor estadia possível de acordo com o prometido... é importante que saibam que o “loft” (terceiro quarto) não oferece privacidade máxima, como nos outros quartos. A casa é muito limpa e de resto cumpre exatamente o que descreveu. Ficamos em familia, então esta falta de privacidade nesse loft não chegou a atrapalhar, mas é bom considerarem caso fiquem, por exemplo, com casais de amigos. A casa tem uma boa privacidade e tranquilidade. Fernando oferece um serviço de “mini-bar” na casa que é uma grande invenção...   fomos muito felizes essa semana que passamos lá.
Fernando est disponible. Maison Verte est à 10 min du centre à pied.

We loved our stay at Fernando's place!  It perfectly accommodated our family of 6 - so much nicer than staying in two or three hotel rooms!  It's an easy walk to town.  The excursions pick you up right at the house.  Fernando was a very good host and checked in with us often.  We would definitely recommend staying here!
Great Airbnb. Excellent location, great stay, great amenities. Located close to central Calafate. Highly recommend!
Fernando was very responsive, helpful, and available for questions and advice. The house was small but very cosy, clean, and well located. We highly recommend it.

Fernando was very responsive and met us at the house. It was very clean. Would recommend.

Cheers

Noel's
Had a great time while staying at the house! Fernando is a great host and helped with everything to make our stay a great one! Would highly recommend staying here while in El Calafate!

We very much enjoyed our stay at Madison Vert. The house was comfortable and spotlessly clean. Fernando was quick to respond to every inquiry and made great suggestions. The house is in a great location as it is both quiet and a short walk to both town in one direction or the bird sanctuary in the other. Fernando checked on us regularly and left fresh flowers. We arranged activities for six of our eight full days in advance, leaving two days in case of weather, and that worked well as high wind had one of our activities moved twice. Be sure to visit the bird sanctuary early in your stay because you can reuse the receipt for additional visits, only needing to pay one time.  We hiked a great deal, saw the glaciers, visited Torres del Paine, went horseback riding and visited an estancia. We will recommend both El Calafate and Madison Vert to our friends.

Maison Verte is a great place. It is close to everything you want to see downtown and is very comfortable.  Fernando the host is very accommodating.  You will not be disappointed if you want a home experience and not a hotel.

On our pass back through El Calafate, we returned to Maison Verte and were just as enamored with it as during our first stay a week prior (see our previous review). Fernando continued to be an outstanding host despite our inability to communicate to him any information about our arrival time returning from Puerto Natales (all cell service and WiFi was inefficient for even (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) messages). It was a complete pleasure to return to Maison Verte and enjoy more of El Calafate. We absolutely recommend a stay here!

Maison Verte is a complete gem of a find! We were 4 women traveling together and unanimously agree that we love Maison Verte. We were so enchanted that we will stay again on our reverse route out of Chile back to Argentina. Fernando is a great host and communicated with me leading up to check in and provided the perfect tips for finding our way around town and securing provisions. The space itself is great and was made up with beds aplenty for us.  Totally enchanted with Maison Verte.
Good location for town and bird sanctuary. Fernando lives just behind the house .

Fernando's 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom bungalow with loft is the perfect spot for a stay in El Calafate.

Situated in a residential area within walking distance from downtown, we were close to all of the main areas of El Calafate, including restaurants, grocery stores, and shopping.  When we opted for a taxi ride after a big meal or grocery store visit, it was only about 50-75 pesos for a ride.

In addition to walking downtown, this house is situated only a few blocks from the Reserva Laguna Nimez nature preserve and public Lago Argentino beach.  Both places offered amazing views of the wildlife and majesty of the area.

As a host, Fernando was always attentive and very responsive during the booking and pre-arrival process to answer any questions that we had.  We were able to communicate via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) to perfectly time our check-in, and for any questions or concerns we had during our stay.

During our visit, Aerolineas Argentinas went on strike, and our outbound flights were cancelled.  Fernando jumped into action and saved us from a potentially disastrous situation.  He drove us to the airline office, assisted in translating and communicating our needs, and made sure we would not be stranded in Patagonia (not that it would have been that terrible).

We cannot thank Fernando enough for the hospitality and assistance.  Out of the 5 places we rented during our travels to Argentina, he was the most attentive and responsive host.  If you are on the fence, don't hesitate any longer, or this place may get booked and you will lose out on a great opportunity.
Central location host responsive to requests
O chalé é bem aconchegante e funcional, e a calefação é muito boa! O Fernando foi solícito e ajudou com dicas da cidade/passeios. Recomendo!

Fernando's place is a real gem. The place was impeccably clean and filled with all the necessary goods from fully equipped kitchen, heated floor and washing machine. From the instance I booked the place Fernando contacted me and we were in touch the whole time. Fernando also assisted us throughout and really made a difference to our stay. highly recommend A++.
Fernando is a very good guest and his place is a very comfortable, well heated cabin with lots of space. I would definitely recommend this place and Fernando.
Great spot for a night or two!

O anfitrião foi muito atencioso nos ajudando em nossa estadia. O link da propriedade é muito claro e real em todos os detalhes. A casa é ótima, limpa, grande e confortável.  Fica perto da rua principal que se pode ir caminhando sem problemas. Vale a visita!

Casa excelente, limpa, bonita e com ótima calefação. Camas extremamente confortáveis, espaço impecável, louças e mobílias novas, muita próxima a rua principal, perto do terminal rodoviário. Banheiro limpo com ótima ducha. Tornou nossa experiência em El Calafate muito mais prazerosa.

Fernando's place was incredible. The walk was not very far from almost anything as the house is relatively centralized. The house itself was very good with plenty of room and beautiful interior design. Fernando was very friendly and helped us to figure out what we wanted to do in the town and how best to go about doing those things. I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

Tudo perfeito.
A casa fica próxima a rua principal e é extremamente facil de achar o caminho.
Tudo estava limpo e casa é muito aconchegante, o Sistema de aquecimento é fantastico e todas as outras amenidades eram ótimas.
Fernando é extremamente solicito e nos ajudou a todo momento, foi muito gentil e preocupado com a nossa (URL HIDDEN) certeza fez o nosso tempo em El Calafate melhor que o esperado.

Petite maison parfaite, notre séjour chez Fernando fut magnifique. L'hôte était disponible, respectueux et très gentil. Il nous a préparé une multitude d'infos afin que nous puissions profiter au maximum de la région. Un gros 5 étoiles!!!  Merci encore 1000 fois pour le bel accueil.

Foi uma estadia muito agradável na casa do Fernando, é um local que gostaria de ficar novamente. Tudo estava perfeito, desde organização, localização e limpeza até a interação com o Fernando, que é uma pessoa muito amigável, solícito e objetivo. A calefação da casa é algo a se destacar, por ser através de piso aquecido é muito mais agradável.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. It was a very cute little house and a great location. We loved the heated floors! The house was always warm when it was very cold outside! 
The drainage system in the shower was not ideal and the bathroom floor got very wet. 
Fernando lives next door and was always helpful whenever we needed anything. 
A wonderful trip overall and we would recommend this Airbnb.

Fernando est super attentif, disponible et gentil. Il nous a attendu alors qu'on est arrivés tard. Il nous a donné des conseils pour les alentours. La maison est bien placée, et superbe ! Tout est équipé, et surtout un super chauffage au sol, qu'il a pris soin de mettre avant notre arrivée. On recommande !!

La maison verte est située non loin du centre ville (nous avions une voiture de location). La maison est très bien équipée et l'accueil chaleureux.  Nous avons eu un problème pour faire fonctionner le chauffage mais nous avons contacte notre hôte et le problème a été résolu dans la demi- heure.  La  maison est très agréable et très calme.

A casa é confortável, espaçosa, sistema de calefação muito bom. É completa, com todos utensílios de cozinha, cama, mesa e banho. O atendimento ótimo. O Sr. Fernando mora próximo e está sempre disponível. Recomendamos o local.
La maison est agréable, bien équipée, les lits sont confortables, tout est très propre, 1/4 d heure à pieds du centre. Fernando nous a fournit toutes les infos necessa

Family of 4, we had an excellent (EMAIL HIDDEN)munication was excellent and check-in was easy. The location of Fernando's home is about a 7-minute walk from the main street of town and a 15-25 minute walk to anything in town (museums, lake, parks). The home itself is spacious and comfortable - even in winter. The beds were comfortable, bathroom spacious and a great kitchen for cooking. A special mention would be the radiant heating in the floor which is such a luxury when its 30 degrees F/0 degrees C! Fernando was an excellent host and always a message away when we had questions. He also offered to drive us into town a couple times. Highly recommend!

Deux nuits à El Calafate
Appartement avec deux chambres + une mezzanine, tres propre, tres bien rangé, agréable, serviettes pour tout le monde. À 10 minutes à pied du centre ville. Propriétaire tres poli avec qui l'on discute facilement sur (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). Cuisine fonctionnelle bien fournie. Chauffage au sol. Bref rien a redire.

Wat een geweldige verrassing de ontvangst bij "la Maison Verte". Op loopafstand van het (leuke!) centrum van Calafate en Fernando is een geweldige gastheer. Het huis is van alle gemakken voorzien en heeft zelfs VLOERVERWARMING! We hadden graag een extra nachtje gebleven... :)

Fernando was a great host and the place is amazing! It is just a few short blocks from the main street in El Calafate. It is very large and can accommodate a large group of travelers. Fernando is very friendly, helpful, and kind. Communication was easy and timely. Highly recommend!

Fernando was an amazing host, very attentive and accommodating. The place is very clean and located close to the main strip. Wifi works great. Hot showers. Full kitchen. It's all here. Highly recommend. Gracias Fernando!

Maison Vert was perfect! A couple friends and I stayed for two nights to check out the nearby national park. The place was exactly as pictured: clean, cozy and charming. Fernando was super communicative and made the check-in/check-out process seamless. On account of an inaccuracy on AirBnb's behalf (not Fernando's), the house is actually located two blocks north than where it's depicted online. Not a big deal - the downtown is still an easy walk and it's still centrally located. Would definitely recommend.
Exactly what it says! Perfect experience and highly recommended!

Lovely home. Very spacious. Could accommodate up to five people very quiet at night residential. He lives next door but did not invade our privacy but always available. Short walk to shops and restaurants. All amenities nieces. He was so nice to give us a ride after our stay to our airport shuttle. Highly recommend. Great location for bird watchers.

La maison de Fernando est très grande et très bien équipée. Le quartier est très calme et pourtant très proche du centre ville et des commodités.

Fernando est très sympathique, toujours près à donner tous les renseignements nécessaires, et il a tout prévu, y compris tous les documents nécessaires aux activités environnantes.

En clair, Fernando fait tout ce qu'il peut pour ses locataires.

Je recommande vivement cette adresse !

This home is perfect for families or groups traveling to El Calafate. About a 15 minute walk from the bustling downtown area, very quiet and spacious.  Clean, tidy, with plenty of amenities. We enjoyed our stay.
Fernando was a fabulous host. He was very available whenever we needed anything, very responsive. The home was spacious and comfortable. Thank you!
Achei o chalé um graça. Muito bonito e aconchegante.

The house has a great, cozy layout and an amazing kitchen space for cooking. We greatly enjoyed our relaxing stay here. Check-in was seamless and Fernando was prompt with his responses if we needed anything or had any questions.

A wonderful home on a quiet block of El Calafate. Ideal for families and all the
amenities one might need.

Cette maison est très spacieuse et confortable, l'équipement est moderne et parfait. Le lieu est proche du Centre et très calme. Fernando a été à notre écoute et nous a donné de très bons conseils. Je recommande cette maison.
Just perfect.

Two bedroom cottage plus loft with one bathroom and laundry facilities. In a quiet neighborhood within walking distance of downtown El Calafate and Lago Argentino.  Owner lives next door and communicates perfectly in English. Very well organized. Shows you everything about the house using a checklist on his phone. Very pleased with our stay.

Fernando was a very friendly, attentive host. His house was very spacious and clean and we all had a very comfortable stay. 

The house is very close to a nature reserve on Laguna Nimez and only a short walk from the centre of town where all the restaurants/bars/tour companies etc are.
总体来说我们对她还是非常满意的 小小的不足就是房子的煤气有点漏气 吓得小伙伴们晚上不敢开暖气 虽然房东说他根本闻不到 哈哈。房东很热心 就住在旁边 经常过来帮我们 出租车也是他帮忙订的 非常感谢。
A very comfortable place within walking distance of the town centre and the bird sanctuary.

3 bedroom private house close to the main drag of El Calafate and close to the nature preserve where you can observe flamingos and other native birds, Clean and comfortable, clean towels and linens, washing machine, full sized fridge and freezer, stove, smart TV and internet provided. Beautiful flowers growing in the yard and there is a cute wooden swing at the front door. Driveway and street parking. Responsive host lives in the house behind and can advise on activities if desired.

Fernando was an excellent host. He was extremely responsive and available to help us with whatever we needed during our stay.  The house is comfortable and just as pictured, about a 10 minute walk to the center of town.  Highly recommended! Gracias Fernando!

Fernando IS one of the kindest airbnb host i've ever met! We've confronted with plentiful problems in el calafate, like wanted bus ticket being sold out, booked shuttle bus not showing up, etc...but Fernando did his best to try to help us solve all those messes! Most importantly, this house is gorgeous!   Lovely loft, nicely-decorated with full amenity(though we didnt have any time to use any of them..). This house stands out in its neighborhood. Great place with great host. Recommend!

I loved everything. The house was fantastique and suitable for five to six persons. Fernando is even ready to change the beds according to everything you may need. The kitchen was wonderfully equipped and the Wlan was working all the time - it was great. We had a great time because the situation was quiet and we could easily reach all we wanted to reach by taxi. And for the excursions: He helped us wherever he could, he phoned and inquired and we had the best time because after one excursion already all the enterprises got us at the house!!! I would really consider everybody who comes to El Calafate with more than three persons to take the local vans and go by van to the excursion points. It is much better and much more comfortable and the drivers look for you and your needs. They stop where you would like to stop and bring you home so safely. Here Fernando helps a lot, too. He gave us the adress of Silvia who arranged all the trips individually and after one experience with an enterprise bus we always took private vans and were so happy with that. Thank you Fernando for helping us! It was .. and it is an unforgettable trip..we are still here because we stayed three days longer.....

Fernando was highly communicative via Air BnB & (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). Excellent! Check-in was thorough & professional...a breeze.

The house is very cool with plenty of space. It's not the closest to the main street in Calafate, but it's definitely walkable (only 7 blocks) and Fernando can provide you a simple map. 

This place is located in a quiet residential neighborhood and we recommend it. There is only one bathroom but we would still recommend it for a family with kids.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Fernando's house, he was hospitable and the house is spotlessly clean and very comfortable. We enjoyed making an Argentinian barbecue and our walks into town through the picturesque paths. The home was great for us family of five. Thank you Fernando.

This is a beautiful, well appointed home.   The kitchen is well equipped and we were able to cook many meals there.    The eat in kitchen and specifically the bar is beautiful, made out of a single piece of varnished wood.    One very pleasant surprise was the heated floors throughout this home which had us always feeling plenty warm - cozy!   The kids especially enjoyed the loft which was roomy enough for both of them to spread out.   We also enjoyed the yard and private drive giving you an added sense of privacy.    Finally, the wifi was extremely strong - we were able to stream Netflix and listen to music through YouTube (they also installed a new flat screen!)

The only thing we missed was a coffee maker, as the coffee in El Calafate is expensive (and small in size).   We did find our host to be extremely responsive and eager to help whenever asked.   We would definitely return to this home if ever lucky enough to return to El Calafate!!
